name: Dating Clicker for LD41
description:
Hello everyone,
this is the game I made for LD41.
It’s coded in C++ with SFML.
Dating Clicker is the first game i made in C++ with SFML and i never tought i would be so hard to make a Dating/Clicker Game but i learned alot.
There are alot of things I wanted to implement but i ran out of time.
I hope you enjoy my Game anyways!
